title: Wooxy: Is it really a Trojan Virus?
body: I'v seen people saying that Wooxy, a custom skins installer for league, is a trojan virus. However, there are tons of people using it, and they haven't reported anything. Does anyone know about this program?

replies.body: We don't support third party apps, especially those that would modify game files.  You absolutely run the risk of malicious content hiding in unsupported programs.  Read over our[ third party guide app](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and be wary.  Better safe than sorry!
